results.abstract: NASA aide Silverstein says Mercury manned flights may start with 3 orbits of earth and increase to 18; stresses no flight will take place until there is maximum assurance of safe return

headline.main: FLIGHT PLANNED FOR ASTRONAUTS; First Trip May Be 3 Circuits of Globe in 4 1/2 Hours, N. A. S. A. Aide Says

results.snippet: SAN DIEGO, Calif., June 11 -- Satellite flights of the Project Mercury astronauts may start with three circuits of the globe and be extended later to as many as eighteen.

byline.original: By RICHARD WITKINSpecial to The New York Times

results.lead_paragraph: SAN DIEGO, Calif., June 11 -- Satellite flights of the Project Mercury astronauts may start with three circuits of the globe and be extended later to as many as eighteen.
